alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 9:19PM EST until February 20 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. ...Forecast flooding changed from Moderate to Major severity for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Major flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM EST Saturday the stage was 31.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 PM EST Saturday was 31.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is currently at crest and is expected to drop below flood stage late Monday morning. The river will fall to 14.4 feet by Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 30.3 feet on 03/06/2015. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. The next statement will be issued 3 a.m. early Sunday morning.
